evidence: we can decompose this image into a collection of smooth, sinusoidal wave patterns
we can think of an image as a sum of many such 2D waves
we take a complex image, and represent it using simple, smooth building blocks
not as pixels, but as combinations of spatial frequencies
Fourier methods are so foundational in signal processing, image analysis, and modern AI

concepts.term: each one is a different sinusoidal basis function

evidence: this tells us how much of each frequency is present in the image.
triples.o: how much of each frequency is present in the image
